availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard H. Paxton (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mildred Burrus Paxton in Mercer County on October 16, 1833. Father of James E. Paxton, Philip J. Paxton, Ann E. Paxton, John W. Paxton, Mary F. Paxton, Gabriel Paxton, Ellen J. Paxton, and Richard G. Paxton. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 239B.
